boostFor(bytes32,uint256).details: If the contract ownes gas token it will try and use it for gas price reduction

params._amount: Amount of Dai to convert to Eth

repayFor(bytes32,uint256).details: If the contract ownes gas token it will try and use it for gas price reduction

params._amount: Amount of Eth to convert to Dai

params._maxRatio: Maximum ratio that the Cdp can be
params._minRatio: Minimum ratio that the Cdp can be
params._optimalRatioBoost: Optimal ratio for the user after boost is performed
params._optimalRatioRepay: Optimal ratio for the user after repay is performed

addCaller(address).notice: Adds a new bot address which can call repay/boost

boostFor(bytes32,uint256).notice: Bots call this method to boost for user when conditions are met

getRatio(bytes32).notice: Calculates the ratio of a given cdp

removeCaller(address).notice: Removed a bot address so it can't call repay/boost

repayFor(bytes32,uint256).notice: Bots call this method to repay for user when conditions are met

subscribe(bytes32,uint256,uint256,uint25.notice: Owners of Cdps subscribe through DSProxy for automatic saving
